name: Sinking Sailors
description:
Global Gamejam from 2020 

Stop your ship from sinking and make it home Controls: WASD = Movement Space = Jump E = Interact K/Ctrl = Hammer/Repair Xbox Controllers Right Analog stick = Movement A = Jump B = Interact X = Hammer/Repair

original submission here https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/sinking-sailors-8

Benjamin McNeill Portfolio [https://frozenwispstudios.wixsite.com/mysite]- programmer/level designer

Luisa Soriano Portfolio [https://sorianodigital.wixsite.com/mywebsite] - 3D artist/designer
